item.title: LyDian AI Platform Now Live
item.dc:creator: Emrah Şardağ
item.description: LyDian AI Ecosystem is now live, offering enterprise-grade AI solutions across healthcare, legal, civic intelligence, and financial sectors. Our platform combines advanced AI models with domain-specific expertise to deliver actionable insights.
item.content:encoded:
LyDian AI Ecosystem officially launched with comprehensive AI-powered solutions:

  • LyDian IQ: Multi-modal AI assistant with vision, voice, and reasoning capabilities
  • Medical Expert AI: Healthcare diagnosis support with FHIR integration
  • Legal AI (HukukAI): Turkish legal research and case analysis
  • Civic Intelligence Grid: Smart city solutions for public safety and resource optimization
  • Quantum Pro: Real-time financial market analysis

All modules are production-ready with enterprise security, HTTPS/HSTS, and white-hat compliance.

item.title: LyDian IQ - Multi-Modal AI Assistant
item.dc:creator: LyDian AI Team
item.description: LyDian IQ combines vision, voice, and reasoning AI to provide comprehensive assistance. Features include image analysis, voice interaction, and advanced problem-solving across multiple domains.

item.title: Medical Expert AI - Healthcare Diagnosis Support
item.dc:creator: LyDian AI Team
item.description: Medical Expert AI provides clinical decision support with EPIC FHIR integration, symptom analysis, and evidence-based recommendations. Designed for healthcare professionals with HIPAA compliance.

item.title: HukukAI - Turkish Legal Research Platform
item.dc:creator: LyDian AI Team
item.description: HukukAI offers AI-powered Turkish legal research, case law analysis, and document review. Access to comprehensive legal databases with intelligent search and citation validation.

item.title: Civic Intelligence Grid - Smart City Solutions
item.dc:creator:
LyDian AI Team Smart Cities
Civic Intelligence Grid provides real-time analytics for public safety, traffic optimization, resource management, and urban planning. Includes modules for PHN (Public Health Network), RRO (Rapid Response Operations), UMO (Urban Mobility Optimization), ATG (Adaptive Traffic Grid), and SVF (Spatial Vision Framework).
